snippet.title: Beautiful Light - Exclusive Announcement Trailer | Black Summer 2023
snippet.description:
Take a look at the announcement trailer for team-based shooter Beautiful Light. Embark on a dangerous journey through hostile landscapes, solving puzzles, fighting with other players, and searching for mysterious artifacts. Beautiful Light is launching in 2024 for PC with a release on consoles coming at a later date.

#IGN #Gaming
